content: these mittens are knitted in sport/dk-yarn at a tights gauge to make your hands warm all winter **finished measurements** circumference 19 cm the length of the mitten depends on how long you want it to be my mitten is 25 5 cm in total including 5 cm cuff you can knit another size by using other needles or thicker/thinner yarn you can also add or reduce the number of stitches i e the repetition of the chart **amount of yarn** colour a cuff 20 g colour b main colour 45 g colour c contrasting colour 40 g the amount of yarn is estimated for my mittens plus some extra to make sure there is enough note that the amount can vary depending on how long and wide you want your mittens
